## Why You Should Watch Luck By Chance
 
Luck By Chance is a critically acclaimed film that received positive reviews from both critics and audiences. The film has a rating of 7.0 out of 10 on IMDb and 83% on Rotten Tomatoes. The film was praised for its witty script, realistic portrayal of the film industry, stellar performances and catchy music.
 
Luck By Chance is also a film that celebrates the power of dreams and the role of luck in achieving them. The film shows how two aspiring actors, Vikram (Farhan Akhtar) and Sona (Konkona Sen Sharma), overcome various obstacles and challenges to pursue their passion for acting. The film also explores the themes of friendship, love, ambition, fame and success in a humorous and heartwarming way.
